segments.text: Yes , I called you last week from New York . My name is George Lee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a second , PLS . Yes , Mr . Lee , we have a room reserved for you . How long do you plan to stay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Probably two days . My wife will join me tomorrow . Then we will decide when to leave for Seattle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you sign the register , PLS ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , does my room have a private bath ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , every room in this hotel has a private bath .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does my room have twin beds or a double ? I prefer a room with twin beds .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your room has twin beds , Mr.Lee . It also has a view . I am sure you will like it . This is your key . It's on the eighth floor room 801 . The elevator's over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . One more thing , where is your restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The restaurant is on the second floor . We also have a cafeteria on the top floor . If you would like something to drink , you can either call room service or come down here . The bar is right behind the lobby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , you are very kind !
segments.speaker: S1
